channel.title: updates on StatsTools.com
channel.description: Recent content in updates on StatsTools.com

item.title: New Site
item.author: buchananlab@gmail.com (statstools.com)
item.description: Check out the new website! Pages are coming soon with lots of updated materials. I have started a new github site where all the materials for courses will appear, to make it easier for you to find everything you need. I have provided entire courses for you to take yourself, use for your classroom, etc. If you are an instructor and want to check out the answer keys, please drop me a line by using the email icon at the bottom of the screen.
